Reviews.Title: Processing power in a tablet!
Reviews.Author: DealBuyz
Reviews.Content: The previous review is reviewing the docking station not the tablet.This tablet has an i5 processor and 256 GB of storage and 8 GB or RAM.  That's more than many laptops.The look is sleek and it is very light.  Sturdy construction.

Reviews.Title: problems the manufacture did not fixed after 2 moths of promisses
Reviews.Author: Roman
Reviews.Content: Hi,just give up everybody until it is not to late for return date.I bought one Dell venue for my dad (Dell Venue 11 Pro (64GB) $499.99) and one for me (New Dell Venue 11 Pro (128GB) $849.99) and was dreaming to get  the dock station to be able to connect to all my monitors.I received yesterday the dock station and from the beginning did not work  well- the simple hdmi to hdmi , result=> black screen not connected. (mini Hdmi the screen is working )Here are some issues after 9 days of testing:1)it won't turn off unless I hold for 10 secs to hard shutdown2)Ghost images on display (bubbles and crazy stuff) ghost touching, system freezeup3)Keyboard freeze/disconnect4) poor battery life5)screen flickering6)dock station not working.At the end I send everything back to the manufacture.Sad , good project and concepts.
